column5: My contract is running out within 60 days and my current carrier(Telus) is really trying to keep me as a client.. I am a former agent with them as well and know how to work them over for the plans etc.  My questions for the forum are: 1) If you were getting another cell phone and wanted GPS on it as well, is the cell phone version of GPS accurate enough in marking favourite fishing locations ?  2) Within how many feet of the target are they accurate?  Thanks Splashhopper
wasnt there a thread about the mapping software app for the iphone recently? i havent used it but i think someone brought it up the other day  ryan   there we go, found it iphone navionics thread
I run a HTC Touch with Garmin Mobile XT and the Garmin Bluecharts, works extremely well.
